testsuite.name: Script.LargeFiles_AutomationTesting
testsuite.system-out: Scenario 01: Log into EWA Enter valid user name into username field Enter valid password into password field Select a Room Click Login button Session message not appeared User logged in successfully...

Scenario 01: Add large PDF file Click on new document menu tab Click on destination folder textbox Expand cabinet Expand drawer Select the folder Folder is selected for Create New Documents Click on select folder dialog OK button Select a document type Enter document name Add a file by using auto IT Click on create button Click on view button Click on save button Click on save tab OK button Large PDF file added successfully... Large PDF file added successfully...

Scenario 02: Add large TIFF file Scenario 01: Log into EWA Enter valid user name into username field Click on new document menu tab Click on destination folder textbox Expand cabinet Expand drawer Select a folder Click on browse folder dialog OK button Folder is selected for Create New Documents Select document type as CVReports Enter document name Mouse hover on browse icon Select browse option Add a Large TIFF file from folder by using Auto IT script Click on create button Click on view button Click on save button Click on save dialog OK button Large Tiff file added successfully...

Scenario 03: Add Large Word(DOCX) file Scenario 01: Log into EWA Enter valid user name into username field Click on new document tab Click on destination folder textbox Expand cabinet Expand drawer Select a folder Click on Destination folder dialog OK button select a document type Enter a file name Mouse hover on browse icon Select browse option Add large word file by using AutoIT script Click on create button Click on view button Click on save button Click on save dialog OK button Large Docx file added successfully...

Scenario 04: Add Large EXCEL file Click on new document tab Select folder from destination folder dialog Expand cabinet Expand drawer Select a folder Folder is selected for Create New Documents Click on destination folder dialog OK button Click on document type dropdown Select document type Enter a file name Mouse hover on browse icon Click on browse option Add large excel file from folder by using AutoIT script Click on create button Click on view button Click on save button Click on save dialog button Large xlxs file added successfully...
